title: Himi 528
lyrics:
8 & 6 & tau
1.
Na’e fai tokua ha fu’u fononga,
Ko Sīsū pe na’e fotu;
Na’e ‘asi ‘i he ‘atānoa
Ki Langi na Taupotu.
Nau a’u he Kolo Tapafā,
‘O ui ‘a e kau le’o,
Ke haʻu ‘o to’o ‘a e matapa
Kae hū honau fu’u Helo.
He ne tu’u ne toe tu’u,
‘Ene ngāue kuo lava;
‘O ne hū, ne toki hū
Ki he Kolo Ta’engata.
2.
Ne hū he matapā masani,
‘O fou he Hala Koula;
‘Ilonga ‘ene tau naʻe fai,
‘A si’ono monuka.
Nau sio ki he Fili Lahi
Kuo taki mai pōpula;
Nau hanga ‘o kalanga’aki
‘A ‘ene fu’u ikuna.
He ne tu’u, etc.
3.
Nau a’u pē ki he loto’ā
He Temipale Tapu,
Tangaki hono matapā
Ke Ne hā’ele atu:
Tuē he ngaahi laumālie,
Hou’eiki mā’olunga,
‘O lī ki lalo fulipē
‘Enau kalauni koula,
He ne tu’u, etc.
4.
Hā’ele atu ia ki mu’a
He tahi sio’ata,
Ki he taloni he ‘Otua,
He feitu’u motu taha.
Ne heka leva la ki ai,
He potu to’omata’u,
‘O ‘ai pē hono lāngilangi
Ko e Hau taupotu atu.
He ne tuʻu, etc.*
